name: NOM DE GUERRE
description:
a 40 page collaborative comic, 5x8", done in traditional media. contains mentions of and two depictions of violence (+ war, + PTSD.) it's Superpose-adjacent, illustrating (a childhood experience from) another family of some note, the one that hasn't shown up in the comic yet-- the Vegas.

the physical book can be ordered thru the Superpose store http://superpose.storenvy.com/
